title: Forum: Address littering at Kranji Reservoir Park
title_page: Forum: Address littering at Kranji Reservoir Park | The Straits Times
maintext:
I visited Fishing Ground A at Kranji Reservoir Park on Aug 19 and was very disappointed to see the amount of rubbish strewn everywhere despite dustbins available nearby.
This poses a health risk as well as a risk to wildlife ingesting the rubbish. Why can’t everyone just bin their trash before leaving? While I am sure that the relevant authorities will efficiently clean up the place, it represents an unnecessary drain on resources.
There is a need to take effective action to address this problem through stricter enforcement of anti-littering laws as well as conducting community outreach programmes to raise awareness of this potential hygiene and social problem.
Having someone to patrol the area would be helpful.
